title: Kenya - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi citizens must obtain an eVisa before entering Kenya
Passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of travel
Applicant must have a relative (next of kin) residing in Bangladesh during their travel

details.title: Required Documents
items: Passport cover page and bio page (color scan copy)
One recent passport-size color photo (white background, JPG format)
Name and contact information of one relative staying in Bangladesh during your visit
Hotel booking details (to be arranged by Chologhuri)

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
